data.name: Best / Curated Roll

data.description:
>>Guard does not matter anymore<<

Falling Guillotine's Heavy Attack is receiving a large nerf, so for DPS you will only be spamming Light Attacks again just like every other Sword Archetype.

If you want to be very specific, Swordmaster's Guard is the "best" for Heavy Attack spam.
data.name: Best Perks

data.description: Vorpal is 14.79% Damage on every hit. It is the better option for everything that takes less than 5 swings to kill, & a strong choice if you will mainly use this Sword for its Ranged Attack.
data.name: Ranged & DPS
